0P000148Q1.TO.long_name: NCM Small Companies Class - Series I
0P000148Q1.TO.summary:
The Fund is designed to achieve long-term capital appreciation by investing in securities of small and mid capitalization equities. 
 Its portfolio may consist of all types of equity and debt obligations of issuers in Canada and the United States that may or may not be listed for trading upon the facilities of stock exchanges or other organized and regulated trading facilities in Canada and the United States. Assets of the Fund may also be invested in debt obligations or held in cash to the extent that economic, market or other conditions make it appropriate.

0P0001AC6P.TO.long_name: CI Cambridge Pure Canadian Equity Corporate Class CLASS ET5 shares
0P0001AC6P.TO.manager_bio: Greg Dean, Analyst and Portfolio Manager, has six years of investment management experience. Prior to joining CI, Mr. Dean was a research analyst at Fidelity Investments from 2008-2011. Mr. Dean joined Cambridge Global Asset Management as a research analyst in 2011 covering global energy, consumer and infrastructure sectors. Mr. Dean holds a Bachelor of Mathematics from the University of Waterloo, a BBA from Wilfrid Laurier University and the CFA designation. He was named one of the TopGun Investment Minds by Brendan Wood International in 2012 and 2013.
0P0001AC6P.TO.summary: This fund invests primarily in equity securities of Canadian companies. The fund may invest up to 10% of its assets in foreign market investments.

0P0001CEBD.TO.long_name: Hillsdale Canadian Micro Cap Equity Fund Series A CA$
0P0001CEBD.TO.manager_bio: Mr. Guthrie is responsible for establishing corporate strategy and leading its implementation and execution.
